infos.value: Hey, Mach√©rie. Can I ask you something?
I've been dying to ask since before.
That girl that you're with... Isn't she with the enemy?
She and Vistralle are in service of Sadali.
Xiza was sent to infiltrate the Sanctum as Hourne's spy.
Sterne...your felling of Vistralle has forced my hand...
...Bringing my true alliance to light prematurely.
Whether or not you have deceived Sadali is no concern of mine.
I will cut down anyone who bars my path. Nothing more.
Against all of us opposing, you refuse to falter...
Be it one or one hundred, insignificance remains insignificance.
...I can't wait to make you eat those words.
